price: 82 S’ils se détournent, sache que tu es uniquement chargé de transmettre le message en toute clarté.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
